name: SpeedyBrand
long_description:
SpeedyBrand provides SMBs with generative-AI powered marketing content that is effective and affordable. We achieve this by training custom AI models for individual businesses to create hyper-personalized marketing content that gets them more business leads.

We are 3 AI engineers who've shipped AI products at companies like Apple, Microsoft and Nextdoor. We previously founded Vetan â€” an SMB payroll company where we served over 30k SMBs.
one_liner: Generative-AI powered Marketing Content for SMBs
